message: Not sure if this is relevant here, but I'm rapidly becoming a huge fan
Mind you ATM I'm mostly working at it from an implementation angle, helping out with the optimized _io for PyPy, but its a really elegant seperation of concerns without the Java API bloat
to be honest, i haven't looked into it as much as i'd like
really the general composability of the whole thing
biwako currently only uses BytesIO, though i'm sure there are lots of gems in there
stuff like the ability to buffer an arbitrary stream, or encode it
yeah, i'll be looking into the buffered options before too long, i'm sure
